item.title: yawsapi
item.description: 1.check_cookie( A ) -> H = A#arg.headers, case yaws_api:find_cookie_val( ?Cook, H#headers.cookie ) of Val when Val /= [] -> case yaws_api:cookieval_to_opaque( Val ) of {ok, Sess} -> {ok, Sess, Val}; { error, { has_session, Sess }} -> {ok, Sess}; Else -> Else end; [] -> {error, nocookie} end. 2.{ok, _Sess, Cookie} -> yaws_api:delete_cookie_session( Cookie ); 删除session 3.yaws_api:new_cookie_session( Sess ). 新建s
